name: Bugged Out! (KNHP)
description:
You and your partner are housekeepers for millionaires who are away on vacation.

Instead of maintaining the house while they were gone,
you took a relaxing break and came back a day before to clean.

Too bad you didn't know that someone wants to steal your job and planted spiders everywhere!
Worst of all, they shrank you down with a device that broke into pieces.

Kill the spiders in every room.
Find the device pieces to grow back in size.
Work together to not get fired.
Time is ticking before the owners get home.

**Note: Please play game using desktop only.**
